patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance B
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a middle block to B with the left reverse knife-hand.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a low side front snap kick to B with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 1.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Lower the left foot to B and then move the right foot to B forming a left rear foot stance toward B while executing an upward block with a right palm.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A, at the same time executing a middle block to A with a right reverse knife-hand.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a low side front snap kick to A with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 4.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Lower the right foot to A and then move the left foot to A forming a right rear foot stance toward A while executing an upward block with a left palm.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Move the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Execute a right upper elbow strike while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot to D.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Move the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute a left upper elbow strike while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot to D.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a high vertical punch to D with a twin fist.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing an upset punch to D with a twin fist.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Move the right foot on line CD and then turn counter clockwise to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a rising block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Move the left foot to E forming a right L-stance toward E while executing a high side strike to E with the left back fist.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Twist the left fist counter clockwise until the back fist faces downward, at the same time forming a left walking stance toward E, slipping the left foot to E.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a high punch to E with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward E. Perform 15 and 16 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to F, forming a left L-stance toward F while executing a high side strike to F with a right back fist.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Twist the right fist clockwise until the back fist faces downward, at the same time forming a right walking stance toward F, slipping the right foot to F.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Execute a high punch to F with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward F. Perform 18 and 19 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a high block to C with a left double forearm.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while forming a right L-stance toward C, pulling the left foot.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high block to C with the right double forearm.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Execute a middle punch to C with the right fist while forming a left L-stance toward C, pulling the right foot.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the left foot.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Lower the left foot to C forming a right L-stance toward C while executing amiddle guarding block to C with the forearm.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Execute a pressing block with the right palm while forming a left low stance toward C, slipping the left foot to C. Perform in slow motion..
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Move the right foot to C forming a left L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with the forearm.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Execute a pressing block with the left palm while forming a right low stance toward C, slipping the right foot to C. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Bring the left foot to the right foot forming a closed stance toward A while executing an angle punch with the right fist. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Move the right foot to A forming a right fixed stance toward A while executing a U-shape block to A.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to B forming a left fixed stance toward B, at the same time executing a U-shape block to B.
patternSteps.34: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position.
